# Introduction {.unnumbered}

This notebook outlines the genomics of ancient Pacific cod. This project is funded as a part of a larger Navigating the New Arctic (NNA) Incubator Grant with the genomics aspect gaining additional funding through an NSF Office of Polar Programs Postdoctoral Fellowship.
